p: In the U.S., however, WBE has received little national reception. While some municipalities and sewage treatment plants in the U.S. have shown interest in piloting WBE for local Covid-19 tracking (e.g., see: City of Tempe, 2020), state and federal governments in the U.S. have expressed surprisingly little interest. Only as of this writing has any indication begun to emerge that U.S. federal agencies (i.e., the CDC and EPA) might be interested in WBE for Covid-19 ( Swan et al., 2020).
